rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a reception counter and coat closet. Vastu-aligned with main entrance facing east.
Open space adjoining the central courtyard, featuring modern seating arrangements and ambient lighting. Aligns with Vastu for social interactions.
Adjacent to the living room with a semi-open layout towards the courtyard, ensuring proper air circulation.
Efficient kitchen space near dining area, located in the north-west as per Vastu guidelines for water and fire balance.
Spacious bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, positioned in the south-west to harness positive energy as per Vastu.
Functional workspace integrated into the bungalow design, placed on the north side to encourage productivity.
Convenient storage and utility space located near the living areas for easy access.
A serene open-air space with landscaping and water features to promote relaxation and maintain natural energy flow.
